item.title: Cant run client§!§ (nexon-world)
item.dc:creator: @darkzcap3 darkzcap3
item.description:
@darkzcap3 wrote:

My friend are having problems opening the client he have JDK and Jre newest the Client is Nexon-world, when he open the .exe/cmd file it opens and closes fast, and nothing happens, ive tired to make it into an jar and everytihng but the same shit happens, anyone can help? the Run info is this:
@echo off
java -cp asm-all-3.3.jar;clientlibs.jar; RunClient servaddr 00.000.000.00 <- my ip is actually here :3

Read full topic
